Articles.Content:
You yanked our chain perfectly. Well played sir, well played!

Ninja edit: April Fool's prank assumed

Edited April 1, 2014 by Wayfare

Wait, so there wasn't a bug?

Now I'm telling myself "You fool!"
Sad to say, there were bugs...but thanks? If it's a positive, I will take credit for it. If it's a negative, I will forever deny its existence. Take your pick
What bugs existed? Just out of curiousity.

@KvickFlygarn87

In some YouTube videos of player, whose got a prerelease of the update, crashing a ship resulted in continuous explosions for minutes(!). Even when there wasn't anything left what can explode.

Sad to say, there were bugs...but thanks? If it's a positive, I will take credit for it. If it's a negative, I will forever deny its existence. Take your pick

Seriously, if it was a joke, then honestly well played! If it wasn't... Well will you just shut up and claim this as an April Fool's joke already, I'm handing you a free pass here
Are there still grown ups who actually care about April Fools day and those childish jokes? Come on..

@KvickFlygarn87

In some YouTube videos of player, whose got a prerelease of the update, crashing a ship resulted in continuous explosions for minutes(!). Even when there wasn't anything left what can explode.

That's not a bug! That's the best feature!

Are there still grown ups who actually care about April Fools day and those childish jokes? Come on..

Are there those who don't?

Are there those who don't?

Well, my parents plastic-wrapped my door this morning.

So yeah.....

Seriously, if it was a joke, then honestly well played! If it wasn't... Well will you just shut up and claim this as an April Fool's joke already, I'm handing you a free pass here

Haha, maybe other CMs might, but homey don't play dat. I think it'd be unfair of me to claim everything that happened in the name of a joke. Thank you, though. The thought is enough

Seriously though, well done Rowsdower! You acted as a Community Manager should, facilitating communication between us and the devs, and did so very well! Here's hoping you can take a vacation now that the ARM pack is released!
